actionCalls.description: Notifies the new Case Owner that the case is transferred to them.
actionCalls.name: Case_Owner_Change
actionCalls.label: Case Owner Change

actionCalls.description: Survey sent to client after a support case has been resolved.
actionCalls.name: Case_Resolved_CSAT_Survey

actionCalls.description: From : "1-800Accountant Billing" <chargebacks@1800accountant.com> Recipients : Case Field - Contact Email
actionCalls.name: Chargeback_CSAT_Survey
actionCalls.label: Chargeback CSAT Survey

actionCalls.description: Classic Email Template - Account Cancelled Trigger Email - in "Cancellations" folder.
actionCalls.name: Send_Cancellation_Email

constants.description: Classic Email Template in Cancellations folder - Account Cancelled Trigger Email.
constants.name: constCancellationEmailTempId

constants.description: For a newly created case, Add 1 to the Case Score
constants.name: constNewCaseScore

decisions.description: If Case: Closed is True, set Closed By field to LastModifiedBy First + Last Name. Process_Override field is toggled in the Case- Schedule Triggered - Daily flow.
decisions.name: Mark_Case_Closed_By
decisions.label: Mark Case Closed By

decisions.description: Send Email alert based on the Mitel Team values when Case Type is Tax Compliance
decisions.name: Mitel_Team_Zones
decisions.label: Mitel Team Zones

decisions.description: For Email to case, the Account Id maybe blank on creation and populated later. Case Score must be populated for newly created Billing case (can be updated when account id is populated)
decisions.name: New_Case_or_Account_Populated
decisions.label: New Case or Account Populated?

decisions.description: Check if Sub-Type Category = Chargeback or Prevention Alert
decisions.name: Sub_Type_Category
decisions.label: Sub-Type Category

decisions.description: Check if Subscription Review case is not Spam or Duplicate and a Primary Cancellation Reason is being populated or changed.
decisions.name: Subscription_Review_Cases
decisions.label: Subscription Review Cases

rules.name: Cancellation_Reason_changed
rules.conditionLogic: (1 AND 2) AND (3 OR 4) AND (5 OR 6 OR 7)
rules.label: Cancellation Reason changed

Flow.description: Flow to run upon create or edit of a case record.
